text: Kyzylorda (; formerly known as Kzyl-Orda, Ak-Mechet, Perovsk, and Fort- Perovsky), is a city in Kazakhstan. It is in the middle south of this large country. The city has a population of 242,462 (2020 census). It is round the Syr Darya river and the site of a Kokand fortress. The population of the city with nearby villages is 312,861 (2020 census). == References == Category:Cities and towns in Kazakhstan Category:Kyzylorda Region
title: Kyzylorda
